name: Idle Colony Tycoon
description:
Here at Capital Colony Tycoon Inc. we believe that all money CAN BE earned! How? Colonize a small island in the Capital Archipelago, build some top tier establishments, mainly an Inn. Populate it with the cream of society, traders and other thieves. Give some free buzz from time to time. Proclaim yourself the undeniable god emperor of your island. Cut some corners and make some capital, get the protection of the respected gentlemen sailing under the black flag, even better get them under your protection, build a fleet, and move to the next island, a bigger one this time. Do not forget about the free buzz, from time to time. Expand an empire just for yourself! Enjoy the process.

Features:
- So casual that it plays by itself
- Exclusive management system
- Challenging Missions and Events
- Amazing 3d graphics
- No persecution if you take bribes, it is your empire anyway!
